item.title: Synagogue attacker shot multiple times by police
item.description: Two Jewish men were killed when Jihad Al-Shamie attacked the synagogue before being shot dead by police.

item.title: Where might Andrew live on the Sandringham estate?
item.description: The sprawling Norfolk estate is home to several properties - here is a look at where Andrew might be moving in.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa death toll rises as aid struggles to reach parts of Jamaica
item.description: Authorities report at least 30 people have been killed in Haiti and 19 in Jamaica as a result of the devastating storm.

item.title: Nvidia strikes bumper AI deals with Asia tech giants
item.description: Fresh from $5 trillion valuation, global chips giant Nvidia has signed deals with LG, Hyundai and Samsung

item.title: The Hundred to hold auction and increase salaries
item.description: The Hundred will launch a player auction and significantly increase salaries for the 2026 season, following private investment into the competition.
